about_the_game:
Bring the Fire! Draigs Terror is a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Legends of old told the many tales of the ancient Draig, fearsome and powerful with incinerating flames that turned enemies to ashes.



The Draigs Terror DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so that you can bring the heat and looking great while doing so.

Now you can reign terror on Sker Island with the fire-breathing mask legends were born from, the Draig themselves. Let your allegiance to the Draig be known with a Dragon Emblem and the Burning Village background. Not only that, strike terror into your most formidable enemies with an exclusive in-game Dragon’s Rage voice line.



This pack includes 4 new items:

Draigs Terror

An Exclusive Premium Mask of the legendary Draig themselves with the ability to breath fire

Burning Village


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Burning Village

Dragon's Rage

An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to strike terror into your enemies

Draig Emblem

An Exclusive Draig Emblem Player Icon to show everyone who’s bringing the heat
